mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SCH ORDER BY NO DESC
SELECT * FROM SCH ORDER BY LIKE1 DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCH(NO, email, name, start_date, end_date, period, season,theme,private1,writedate,main_img) VALUES(SCH_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{name}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{period}, #{season}, #{theme},#{private1},sysdate,#{main_img})
mapper.select: select * from sch where no = (select max(no) from sch) and email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCH_DAY(NO, DAY, SCH_NO) VALUES(SCH_DAT_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{day}, #{sch_no})
INSERT INTO SCH_LIKE(NO, EMAIL, SCH_NO) VALUES(SCH_LIKE_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{sch_no})
mapper.select: select * from sch_like where email = #{email} and sch_no = #{sch_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCH_COMMENT(NO, EMAIL, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, SCH_NO) VALUES(SCH_COMMENT_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{content}, sysdate, #{sch_no})
mapper.select: select s.detail_turn, a.name, a.content, s.area_no, s.no from area a inner join sch_detail s on a.no = s.area_no where s.sch_no= #{no} and s.sch_day_no= #{sch_day_no} order by s.detail_turn
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCH_DETAIL(NO, SCH_DAY_NO, SCH_NO, AREA_NO, DETAIL_TURN) VALUES(SCH_DETAIL_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sch_day_no}, #{sch_no}, #{area_no},(SELECT NVL(MAX(DETAIL_TURN)+1,1) FROM SCH_DETAIL WHERE sch_no = ${sch_no} and sch_day_no = ${sch_day_no}))
